1 8 ounce bag weet potato chips ( crushed * (I used the Terra brand))
2-3 cups sweet potato chips or about 20-24
1 (1-pound) package Camellia Brand Red Kidney Beans
1 pound (16 ounces or scant 2 ½ cups) dried black beans*
3 cup lactose free whole milk (740 g)
Lactaid milk (2% or whole, depending on desired creaminess)
3/4 lb spaghetti (or buccatini (use your favorite gluten-free brand))
1 box gluten free pasta (* see note)
4 ounces chickpea penne or other penne pasta (about 1 1/4 cups dry)
12 ounces uncooked chickpea fettuccine pasta (such as Banza)
16 oz chickpea macaroni noodles (like Banza) or whole wheat noodles
1 3-bone standing beef rib-eye roast, chine bone removed (6–6½ lb.), bones unfrenched
